teams.name: Scharlet's Web
teams.loan_because: We recently read 'Half the Sky' and feel empowered that by pooling our small investments, we can create big impacts in the lives of people working to better their lives for themselves and their families.
teams.description: Scharlet's Web is a bookgroup that has been meeting monthly since 1994.  We are named after one of our original members who died of ovarian cancer about a year after we began meeting.  We gather to share our love of books, to laugh, and support each other through love, compassion and humor.
